description: Configuration file for Vitest testing framework, merging custom settings with Vite configuration.

methods.name: mergeConfig
methods.description: Merges two Vitest configuration objects into one.

methods.name: defineConfig
methods.description: Defines a Vitest configuration object with type inference.

methods.name: configDefaults
methods.description: Provides default configuration values for Vitest.

methods.description: Converts a file URL to a filesystem path.
